name: Chinese SimpleLife
description:
Chinese SimpleLife is a living environment simulation.
Control a person to see the city work.
Person can walk,run,crouch,jump and drive.
Open the car door and ride the moto.
Game Feature:
-person control
-traffic system
-people Passerby
-driver car
-ride moto
-two maps
-kill people
-Cross country to the end of the road
-An endless world
